name: paperless-ngx
description: Paperless-ngx is a modern self-hosted document management system. It automates scanning, OCR, tagging, and storage of documents with a user-friendly UI and robust search features.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Optical character recognition automatically extracts text from scanned documents and images for full-text search

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize documents with custom tags, correspondents, and document types for flexible categorization

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Monitor designated folders for new documents and automatically import, process, and index them

features.title: Email Integration
features.description: Import documents directly from email attachments by forwarding messages to dedicated mailbox

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Companion mobile apps for iOS and Android enable document scanning and access from smartphones

features.title: Workflow Automation
features.description: Create rules to automatically tag, rename, or route documents based on content, sender, or criteria
